title: The new jungle items
body: The fact that you can take smite in any lane and then build either Sated Devourer or Runglave and do that much damage it is fucking stupid. I just played a game where a Vayne could 2 shot anyone on out team and solo barron at 30 mins. These items need a nerf or something like that, they are out of control. Riot please.

replies.body:
Vayne jungle was scary... I wish I could solo baron...

On a more serious note, how much was she fed when she started soloing baron?
She had about 14 kills. Then she soloed barron. It is really scary at the moment
